description.value:
Special: Blast (3), Inaccurate, Overheats, Unreliable, Unstable

Note: For Orks, not Unreliable. Kraftsmanship: Poor: autojams for non-orks, -0.5kg, Good: +5 WS/BS, +0.5kg, Best: +5 WS/BS, +1 damage, 1 Kustom Bit, +1kg. If triples are rolled for damage, misfires. Roll 1d10: 1 - Explodes, resolve attack against self ignoring armour and weapon is destroyed, 2-5: Uses 3 extra rounds of "ammo",6-7: Reduce damage to 1d5 and Pen to 0 for attack, 8-9: Weapon is Blast(5) but damage is 1d10 for attack, 10: "Ammo" attacks the user.
